y r hedgehogs called hedgehogs. one wud think this refers to the fact that they are mearly hogs that live in hedges. but a hog is a pig, and unless iam very much mistaken-hedgehogs r small and spikey-and NOT pigs! its weird like that and they are spikey. imagine if they wore their underwear inside out.... oooooo the prickles!! hehe prickles rhymes with pickles like the sign in coffee rep. that sez toffee rhymes with coffee. hehe it does. hehe its funny coz it tru. sings i saw that movie they are watchin u all of them hu r?? shhhhh the goldfish r listenin...... anywoodle-back to pigs. i h8 pigs stooopid stooooopid pigs go around arestin MY friends how dare they wee buggers u no wot blog and bog rhyme and they both fulla crap heather is readyy she wos born ready i say... im sory i dnt update this much coz its very borin i only do it for the amusement of heather,lara and deenie hu all lead very simple lil lives lol this is a sory all about how my life got flip turned upside down, nd id like to take a minuit just sit rite ther ill tell u how i came the princess of a town called worcester..... nah ill tell u a luvly story of wot i did in town ms jess ronan wos in town (being cool as usual) wen mr ryan lanigon stole her camera coz he is norty so she tryed to curl his eyelashes but he wos 2 fast so she tryed to curl his hair but its already curly so she curled his ear. then he took her very cool allstar converses and him and mr tom bowen tryed to throw them in the river!!! she then kicked mr tom bowen to let him giv bac her very cool allstar converses. thanx to ms jes ronan, he mite neva b able to have children. but mr ryan lanigon sed he wud only giv back her very cool allstar converses if she gav him mr emaad latifs hat. but SHE wants mr emaad latifs hat. she likes mr emaad latifs hat. mr chris scanlon then went home and ms jes ronan, ms ella jones and mr emaad latif aka mr pudz, then went to maccys. mr pudz ate 4 burgers, 2 large fries and 2 large cokes! and he only gave ms jess ronan like 10 chips!! its ok, she nicked like 40 :-D lol then pudz'z pudding got BIG !!! den they had to get the train so ms jess ronan waited with mr pudz. he stole her fone so she beat him up then he beat her up ~:~WOMEN BEATER!!~:~ then they got in truble 4 makin 2 much noise and the train guy told them off + ms jess ronan nearly nicked his hat but he got it back just as she wos jumpin on the train! then she poked his pudding. teehee wow wot a gud story, dnt ya think??? in a perfect world jess wud hav nicked pudz hat and wud still hav it and wud b wearin it rite now as she typed this. in a perfect world, in a perfect world.....one can but dream.....if u say stuff twice it has more feelin hehe more feelin lots more feelin in a perfect world there wud b lots more feelin....ryan, thats rite in a perfect world there wud b lots more feelin ryan!! teehee iam bored iam a fairy twinkle twinkle uho, george bush is disco dancin again. thats not to gd. o well life goes on iam bored of this post tata for then tete for now liv, luv levitate :- dorybell x~X~x~X~x~X~x~X~x
